search.query: index=someindex sourcetype=somesourcetype | eval http_status_num = tonumber(payload.http_status) | eval HTTP_Category = case( http_status_num >= 200 AND http_status_num < 300, "200-299", http_status_num >= 300 AND http_status_num < 400, "300-399", http_status_num >= 400 AND http_status_num < 500, "400-499", http_status_num >= 500 AND http_status_num < 600, "500-599" ) | stats count by HTTP_Category | rename HTTP_Category as "HTTP_STATUS"
